overview: Steffen and Lennart wake up after a long party night. Having a bad hangover they accidental kill one of the other party guests. In a series of vignettes we get to know several people who are all involved in the situation. A film about the fact that, we often expect more of others than of ourselves and how difficult it is to accept that we are responsible for our actions.
tagline: In eight Episodes the film tells us about young people who are trying to get rid of a dead body.
title: Just Drifting Along
